injuries.shortComment: Nunn cleared the NBA's health and safety protocol Sunday morning but still remains out with a knee injury, Dan Woike of the Los Angeles Times reports.
injuries.longComment: Nunn has yet to play this season due to an injury and will continue to rehab towards an eventual return.

injuries.shortComment: Davis (knee) suffered a sprained MCL during Friday's game against the Timberwolves and will be re-evaluated in four weeks, Dave McMenamin of ESPN.com reports.
injuries.longComment: What was initially labeled a knee contusion is now revealed to be a sprained MCL for Davis. He's been relatively healthy all year, so this is a tough blow for the oft-injured big man. While Davis is out, DeAndre Jordan, Dwight Howard (COVID-19 protocols), Carmelo Anthony and other frontcourt options should be in line for more minutes.
